text:
[Verse]
Wake up to the light
New day's out of sight
Sunrise in the sky
Dreams that aim so high

[Verse 2]
Hear the morning sing
Birds on feathered wing
Joy is in the air
No more room to spare

[Chorus]
Blissful sunrise you and I
Watch the colors paint the sky
Feel the love in every ray
Starting fresh today

[Verse 3]
Wipe away your fears
New beginnings near
Step into the glow
Life’s a show
Let’s go

[Chorus]
Blissful sunrise you and I
Watch the colors paint the sky
Feel the love in every ray
Starting fresh today

[Bridge]
Hold me close let's fly
Underneath this sky
Hearts that always try
Reach for stars so high
title: Blissful Sunrise
